modName: Tamara Dreloth.. Tales From The Dark Side Of The Mer
summary: Tamara Dreloth is a standalone Dark Elf follower, with high resolution textures, high poly meshes and a custom outfit - UNP / CBBE / SMWO - with HDT body physics and a CITRUS HD head mesh
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6646117-1460499333.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]
Background[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]The majority of the Dreloths fled Vvardenfell, along with many of the other Dunmer clans, following the devastating eruption of the Red Mountain and the subsequent destruction of their homeland by Argonian invaders in 4E. Living a predominantly nomadic existence, they carved out a living mainly as traders, thieves and mercenaries. Some of them settled in other parts of Morrowind and Solstheim, some in Skyrim. Tamara's parents eventually settled in Windhelm, in what's now referred to by the local Nords as the Grey Quarter. And it was here that Tamara was born, although not into entirely happy circumstances. 

Her mother, already unwell at the time from a skeever bite, had died during childbirth, leaving Tamara's father to raise her on his own. Despite the extreme poverty, discrimination and prejudice they endured, he remained a good father to her and as soon as Tamara was old enough to swing a blade, he began training her. Back in Morrowind, her father had been an esteemed member of a local Morag Tong guild and his skills with a blade had earned him the occasional mercenary job in Skyrim - skills he hoped to pass on to Tamara. But times were hard.. and still mourning the loss of his wife, he often turned to drink.

Growing up in Windhelm was a daily struggle. Thieving, pickpocketing, selling skooma and inevitably fighting local thugs became routine for Tamara and her only means of survival. As the years passed, she became increasingly disillusioned with her life and decided to set out for Riften in search of work and adventure. She had heard rumours of a notorious group, calling themselves the Thieves Guild and hoped to find her fortune by joining them. But Vex took an instant disliking to Tamara and her time at the Thieves Guild was short-lived. 

On receiving news of her father's murder during a drunken brawl with local Nords, Tamara has returned to Windhelm looking for answers and to claim her father's sword. The Dragonborn will find her drowning her sorrows in the New Gnisis Corner Club, still hoping for adventure and a way out of the grim, mundane, hell-hole known as the Grey Quarter.[/font][/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6646117-1458431541.png[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Mod Notes[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][About the Character][/size]

[size=3][b]Name : [/b]Tamara Dreloth
[b]Location [/b]: New Gnisis Corner Club, Windhelm
[b]Class [/b]: Combat Rogue
[b]Race[/b] : Dunmer
[b]Level[/b] : 10 - 80 (levels up with PC)
[b]Marriable[/b] : No, she's not the type to settle down
[b]Custom Armour[/b]: Ciri DLC Outfit[/size][size=3]

Tamara uses custom-layered skin and facepart textures and has a high-poly body mesh, including an HD [color=#ff7700]CITRUS[/color] head mesh, which has been hand sculpted and polished in RM. There are three body types to choose from: [color=#ff7700]UNP, SMWO[/color] and [color=#ff7700]CBBE[/color] - all with [color=#ff7700]HDT[/color] body physics. Her custom armour is the Ciri DLC outfit from Witcher 3, ported by Shocky and converted for all three body types with added HDT (all credits and links below).

Special thank you to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12643894/?]Dcypher75[/url] for the SMWO armour conversion and mod testing and also to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3970139/?]VRDaphni[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/28059195/?]triptherift[/url] for their help with cleaning the plugin with TES5Edit.

[Installing/Uninstalling]

Download Manager advised.[/size]


[color=#0000ff][size=4][b]Version Log[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]1.3 - Update. New [b]archery perks[/b] added: [i]Overdraw, CriticalShot, PowerShot, QuickShot, Bullseye
[/i] - Additional minor cleaning of plugin file.
1.2.1 - Esp file cleaned with TES5Edit. Should now be no conflicts or issues whatsoever.
1.1 - Sword texture fix
1.0 - Initial release[/size][/font]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6646117-1458323240.png[/img]

[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]My Other Mods[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[center][color=#ffff00][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Permissions[/b][/size][/font][/color]

[size=3]You may [b]not [/b]upload this mod to any other site without my consent. You may, however, link back to this page from another site.
If you wish to use any of the components from this mod for your own mod, you must credit the mod authors (as listed).
You may [b]not [/b]use the FaceGenData from this character for your own character, if you then intend to upload it somewhere.[/size][/center]
